appName: Awakening in Space: Robot Combat FPS
displayName: Awakening in Space: Robot Combat FPS
display_name: Awakening in Space: Robot Combat FPS
display_long_description:
Prepare for a journey through the depths of space in Dark in Space: Awakening of the Sleepers. This immersive VR adventure combines intense action, suspenseful horror, and stunning visuals to deliver a gripping gaming experience.

Awaken aboard a colossal starship drifting through the void. As one of the few survivors emerging from cryosleep, you are thrust into chaos. A malfunctioning AI controls the ship, identifying you as a threat and deploying deadly robots. From blade-wielding androids to automated sentinels, danger lurks around every corner.

Your mission: survive. Navigate detailed VR environments, unlock doors, climb ladders, and scavenge for weapons. Solve puzzles, uncover dark secrets about the ship’s journey, and piece together the AI’s corruption. Engage in heart-pounding battles using powerful weapons and tools.

Explore eerie corridors and high-tech control centers, brought to life with cutting-edge graphics and sound design. Limited resources and constant danger make every decision matter.

Features:
- Immersive VR Gameplay: Interact with the environment like never before.
- Thrilling Action: Battle AI-controlled robots with diverse weapons.
- Suspenseful Horror: Atmospheric environments and chilling soundscapes.
- Puzzles and Exploration: Solve puzzles and uncover secrets.
- Stunning Visuals: High-quality graphics bring the starship to life.

Survive chaos. Uncover secrets. Restore control in Awakening in Space: Robot Combat. Your next great VR experience awaits!
